trans-unit.source: Apache Jena - Jena is a Java framework for building semantic web applications. It provides tools and Java libraries to help you to develop semantic web and linked-data apps, tools and servers.
trans-unit.target: Apache Jena-Jena是一个用于构建语义网络应用程序的Java框架,它提供了工具和Java库,帮助您开发语义网络和链接数据应用程序、工具和服务器。它提供的工具和Java库可以帮助您开发语义网络和链接数据应用、工具和服务器。

trans-unit.source: Assuming Python is installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: 假设你的系统上安装了Python。

trans-unit.source: Assumptions:
trans-unit.target: 假设:

trans-unit.source: Building new version
trans-unit.target: 建立新版本

trans-unit.source: CogniPy - Easy Semantic Technology for Python
trans-unit.target: CogniPy-Python的简易语义技术

trans-unit.source: CommandLineParser
trans-unit.target: CommandLineParser

trans-unit.source: ELK - ELK is an ontology reasoner that aims to support the OWL 2 EL profile. See http://elk.semanticweb.org/ for further information.
trans-unit.target: ELK-ELK是旨在支持OWL 2 EL配置文件的本体推理器。有关更多信息，请参见http://elk.semanticweb.org/。

trans-unit.source: HermiT - HermiT is a conformant OWL 2 DL reasoner that uses the direct semantics. It supports all OWL2 DL constructs and the datatypes required by the OWL 2 specification.
trans-unit.target: HermiT-HermiT是一个符合OWL 2 DL推理器,它使用直接语义。它支持所有OWL2 DL构造和OWL 2规范所要求的数据类型。

trans-unit.target: IKVM

trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Mac或Linux，则必须在系统上安装Mono。

trans-unit.target: 使用以下 cognipy 在系统上安装cognipy：

trans-unit.source: Open Source Libraties this project is build on
trans-unit.target: 这个项目是建立在开源的Libaties之上的。

trans-unit.source: Originally released and maintained by Cognitum Services S.A. - the creator of FluentEditor allowing use Controlled Natural Language for Ontology development.
trans-unit.target: 最初发布和维护Cognitum服务SA -的创造者FluentEditor受控自然语言的本体发展允许使用。

trans-unit.source: Semantic Tech Reasoner and Editor
trans-unit.target: 语义技术推理者和编辑

trans-unit.source: Tested on MacOS, Winows and Linux (UBuntu)
trans-unit.target: 在MacOS、Winows和Linux(UBuntu)上测试。

trans-unit.source: Tested with Anaconda
trans-unit.target: 用Anaconda测试

trans-unit.source: The package allows for Reasoning, exploration of RDF/OWL, Fluent Editor CNL files, performs reasoning with OWL/RL Reasoner (Jena) as well as allows using SPARQL Graph queries (Jena)
trans-unit.target: 该包允许推理,探索RDF/OWL,Fluent Editor CNL文件,用OWL/RL Reasoner (Jena)执行推理,以及允许使用SPARQL Graph查询(Jena)。

trans-unit.source: The sorfware emerged as an offspring of FluentEditor and therefore it has some common parts. One of them is the .net. Anyway, with your help we are going to move to java :). The convert_to_java branch already contains the project files converted automatically from .net to java. Anyway, manual crafting is now required to make it all work.
trans-unit.target: Sorfware是FluentEditor的后代，因此具有一些共同的部分。 .net是其中之一。无论如何，在您的帮助下，我们将移至java :)。该 convert_to_java 分支已经包含了项目文件自动转换从.NET到Java。无论如何，现在需要手工制作才能使其全部正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Why it is done this way?
trans-unit.target: 为什么要这样做呢?
